channel.title: v1.10.0 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases
channel.description: Recent content in v1.10.0 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases

item.title: Support Bundle Collects Logs From Path Specified In Setting
item.description: Related issue https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn/issues/11522 Test Given V2 data engine is enabled And /tmp/longhorn/logs/ directory exists on all cluster nodes And log-path setting is set to /tmp/longhorn/logs/ And V2 instance manager pods have restarted When A support bundle is generated Then Files from the host’s log-path directory exist under <NODE>/log in the support bundle
